_header: Hail Christian knight hail eterne comforter
_description: Walter Kennedy, ‘The Passion of Christ’ — 1715 lines in rhyme royal stanzas

BLAru285.First Lines: HAIL CRIstin knycht haill etern confortourHaill riall king in trone celistiall…
BLAru285.Last Lines: …In hevin empire þat þai þi face may seWithout end Amen for þi marcy
BLAru285.Note:
Nineteenth-century transcript in Edinburgh,  National Library of Scotland, Advocates’ 19.1.2, ff.
                    1-61.
BLAru285.Attributed Title: Heir begynnis þe proloug of þe passioun of Crist compilit be M Walter Kennedt (f. 5v); Heir endis the passioun of our Lord Ihesu crist compilit be Maister Walter Kennedy (f. 46v)
